name: Climate Deniers' Inc
description:
My upload for the Brackeys Game Jam.  

Dump trash and destroy the oceans as you wish - because climate change isn't real, right?

It's a clicker business tycoon simulator where you try to earn money by dumping trash, sewage and doing other nasty stuff to the oceans.

It's got a couple of bugs and isn't the best-balanced game. Still, have fun playing it!
